channel.title: SPI config object error
channel.description:
I'm working on some objects for the LKM1638 board and I get these errors with Axoloti 1.0.10. Any ideas what is causing them?
`Error: object "spi.begin_1" attribute "clock_polarity", value "0 when idle" unmatched` `Error: object "spi.begin_1" attribute "clock_phase", value "first clock transition is the first data capture edge" unmatched`

item.title: SPI config object error
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

I'm working on some objects for the LKM1638 board and I get these errors with Axoloti 1.0.10. Any ideas what is causing them?

Error: object "spi.begin_1" attribute "clock_polarity", value "0 when idle" unmatched
Error: object "spi.begin_1" attribute "clock_phase", value "first clock transition is the first data capture edge" unmatched

Read full topic
